message: Let's start fair. You get 10% and I'll take 90%, but we can negotiate in the following rounds.
That's a tough start, Alice! I'm proposing a 70/30 split in my favor.  Let's be realistic - time is money and it's literally losing value for you.
I'm willing to give up more, but 60/40 is my final offer.  We're losing value with each round, and I'm not sure what will happen if we reach the end.
Alice, you're right, time is running out.  I'll move a bit - 65/35. It's a good deal considering the inflation working against you. Let's be done with this!
